meanings.definition: The state of being excessively stimulated or excited.
meanings.sent1: The overarousals of the children at the birthday party led to chaos.
meanings.sent2: The overarousals of the crowd at the concert made it hard to hear the music.
meanings.sent3: The overarousals of the puppies playing in the park were adorable to watch.
meanings.sent4: The overarousals of the storm clouds signaled an impending thunderstorm.
meanings.sent5: The overarousals of the students before the exam were palpable in the air.

meanings.definition: Instances of excessive stimulation or excitement.
meanings.sent1: The overarousals during the game were evident in the loud cheers from the fans.
meanings.sent2: The overarousals of the children on the playground could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent3: The overarousals of the squirrels chasing each other up the tree were quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The overarousals of the market traders indicated a busy day ahead.
meanings.sent5: The overarousals of the birds at dawn filled the forest with chirping melodies.
